name: Lucide
description: Lucide is a set of open-source icons designed by the creator of Tailwind CSS. It is a popular choice for creating visually appealing user interfaces.

name: Sanity
description: Sanity is a headless CMS that allows you to build and manage content without writing code. It is a popular choice for creating content-driven websites.

name: Node
description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment that allows you to run JavaScript code on the server-side. It is a popular choice for building scalable and high-performance web applications.

name: Figma
description: Figma is a vector-based design tool that allows you to create, collaborate, and design beautiful user interfaces.

name: Vue
description: Vue is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It is maintained by Evan You and a community of individual developers and companies.

name: Tailwind
description: Tailwind is a utility-first CSS framework that allows you to build highly customizable and responsive designs. It is a popular choice for creating modern and visually appealing user interfaces.

name: React
description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies.

name: Vercel
description: Vercel is a cloud platform for developers. It is a unified platform that combines the developer experience of the open web with the enterprise-grade infrastructure of the cloud.

name: Next
description: Next is a React framework from Vercel. It is optimized for production and comes with built-in optimizations for performance.

name: Framer motion
description: Framer motion is a library for creating animations in React applications. It is a popular choice for creating smooth and engaging user interfaces.

name: Angular
description: Angular is a TypeScript-based framework for building web applications. It is a popular choice for creating complex and scalable user interfaces.

name: Github
description: Github is a web-based platform for hosting and collaborating on software projects. It is a popular choice for open-source projects and collaboration.

name: Three
description: Three.js is a JavaScript library for creating 3D graphics and animations. It is a popular choice for creating immersive and interactive user interfaces.

name: Payload
description: Payload is a headless CMS that allows you to build and manage content without writing code. It is a popular choice for creating content-driven websites.

name: Astro
description: Astro is a static site generator for building fast and SEO-friendly websites. It is a popular choice for creating modern and user-friendly websites.

name: Deno
description: Deno is a JavaScript runtime for building and running applications. It is a popular choice for creating fast and secure web applications.

name: Docker
description: Docker is a containerization platform for building and deploying applications. It is a popular choice for creating scalable and portable applications.

name: Python
description: Python is a high-level programming language for building web applications. It is a popular choice for creating scalable and maintainable applications.

name: Radix ui
description: Radix UI is a collection of accessible and composable React components for building user interfaces. It is a popular choice for creating accessible and responsive user interfaces.

name: Rust
description: Rust is a systems programming language for building fast and secure applications. It is a popular choice for creating scalable and reliable applications.

name: Stripe
description: Stripe is a payment processing platform for building secure and scalable web applications. It is a popular choice for creating secure and reliable payment systems.

name: Turborepo
description: Turborepo is a monorepo tool for managing multiple packages and applications. It is a popular choice for creating scalable and maintainable projects.

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and other features to the language. It is a popular choice for creating scalable and maintainable applications.
